messageBody:
Hai ...

I need some help regarding writing setUps....
My test design is as follows... Each class has one or more testcase
associated with it. All these testecases are are added to a test suite
such that each package contains one testsuite... At the topmost level i
will be having a mastertestsuite running which would result in testing all
the units... How can i write setUps for one time operations within each
testcase.... For example while testing session beans i want the lookup for
EJBHome to be done only once within a testcase.. How is this possible ??

Regards
DeepStepTom

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
